nbteditor.emptykey.title: Unsupported Item!
nbteditor.emptykey.message: This nbt editor doesn't support items with an empty string ("") as a key. Remove that key-value pair?
nbteditor.noitem: You must be holding an item to edit!
nbteditor.noitem_view: You must be holding an item to view!
nbteditor.name: Name
nbteditor.overwrite.title: That name already exists!
nbteditor.overwrite.message: Do you want to overwrite it?
nbteditor.notsaved.title: Item Not Saved!
nbteditor.notsaved.message: You haven't saved the item. Save changes?
nbteditor.clearpage.title: Are you sure?
nbteditor.clearpage.message: This will permanently delete all 54 items in this page!
nbteditor.nocontainer: You must be holding a container with 27 slots!
nbteditor.signature_arg_missing: §cYou must supply the new signature! /sign edit <new signature>
nbteditor.signature_save_error: §cThere was an error saving your signature!
nbteditor.signature_load_error: §cThere was an error loading the signature, restart game
nbteditor.noskull: You must be holding a player head to edit!
nbteditor.skull_not_loaded: That head hasn't loaded any textures yet!
nbteditor.noblock: You must be holding a block to edit!
nbteditor.noblockstates: There are no block states for this block!
nbteditor.enchantments.tip: You can Ctrl+Click enchanted books onto items in supported inventories.
nbteditor.config.max_enchant_level_desc:
Toggle showing the maximum enchantment
level after the enchantment
nbteditor.config.number_system_enchant_l:
Toggle numbers or roman
numerals on enchantments
nbteditor.config.key_text_size_desc:
How large the text is in the
nbt editor's key list
nbteditor.config.keybinds_desc:
Toggle showing keybind hints
for inventory items
nbteditor.config.chat_limit_desc:
Extend the chat limit for
client commands
nbteditor.config.single_quotes_desc:
Allow surrounding keys and
values with single quotes
(in opened strings)

Can cause problems with text
Can make the nbt shorter
nbteditor.config.key_skizzers_desc:
The keys in the nbt editor don't display
for some users. If you are having this
issue, enable this.

This is not a perfect fix, as scrolling
through the key list will have some
rendering issues.
nbteditor.config.scroll_speed_desc:
Increase/decrease the speed
of scrolling in NBT Editor menus
nbteditor.chat_length_warning_1: WARNING: The text will be truncated to
nbteditor.help_5: §6/open: §7Open the container you're holding. You can put shulker boxes inside shulker boxes!
nbteditor.help_6: §6/get <item | potion | soup | skull | hdb | colorcodes | lostitem | help | credits> [<args>]: §7Get an item or information
nbteditor.help_10: §7Help on a specific feature: §b/get help <nbteditor | clientchest | itemfactories>
nbteditor.help.nbteditor_3: §7Edit item nbt, as well as the item itself and item count.
nbteditor.help.nbteditor_4: §7In the field with the item's name, you can rename like an anvil.
nbteditor.help.nbteditor_5: §7When a value doesn't match the list's value (for example putting an integer into a string list), it will be highlighted yellow. It will not save.
nbteditor.help.nbteditor_6: §7To change the type of something, you can use the same syntax as /data:
nbteditor.help.nbteditor_7: §7"Str" for text, 1b for byte, 5.8d for double, 3 for integer, {} for compound, etc.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_3: §7The client chest exists on all servers and in singleplayer.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_4: §7It automatically saves when a change is made. While saving, an asterisk (*) will appear after the title.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_6: §7The << and >> buttons jump to the previous/next page with items on it, or the first/last page if none is found.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_7: §7Locking the slots prevents the removing of items in the chest, and is forced on while out of creative to prevent item loss.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_8: §7Reloading reloads the page from the file.
nbteditor.help.clientchest_9: §7Clear page deletes everything on that page, and is cannot be undone. There is a confirm dialog in case of a misclick.
nbteditor.help.itemfactories_10: §6unbindskull: §7Remove a skull's link to the original owner
nbteditor.credits_2: §6I hope you enjoy! Don't mess with §otoo§r§6 many §c[Admin] §6ranks :D
nbteditor.credits_6: §7Ported to client sided fabric by mega12345mega
